meanings.sent1: In the game, the team was divided into two tetrads for the final challenge.

meanings.sent3: At the party, the tetrads of friends decided to play a game of charades.
meanings.sent4: The tetrads of colors on the artist's palette blended beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The tetrads of ducks waddled in a perfect formation.

meanings.sent1: The tetrads of flowers in the garden added a pop of color.

meanings.sent4: The tetrads of books on the shelf were neatly arranged by genre.
meanings.sent5: The tetrads of clouds in the sky created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.sent1: Chemistry class discussed the tetrads of the periodic table.
